subject: [Radiance-general] Invitation to connect on LinkedIn
body:
Please do not reply to this or other spurious messages to the mailing list, as it only generates more noise.  I have informed the author and hopefully the situation will be straightened out off-list.

Unfortunately, the mailman list server is not smart enough to filter out unintentional e-mails.

-Greg
